## GerstnerWaveGenerator.setWaveSteepness() method

Sets the steepness of the wave.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setWaveSteepness(waveIndex: number, steepness: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  waveIndex | number | index of the wave to set. |
|  steepness | number | Steepness of the wave. |

**Returns:**

void
